translation.Message_0_Page_0: I joined the military because I wanted to go to college. Funny now, huh?
translation.Message_0_Page_1: When Moneypoint had its meltdown, we got the heck out of there and onto Fort Aileen. According to the docs I'm fine. Pretty sure I'm not growing a third hand.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: We haven't done a military operation in a few weeks. I'm usually assigned to Turbine Maintainment, but someone else took that position, so I get a few days off.
